name: Project Astrid
summary: Shroud announces Project Astrid: The new Open-World Survival Shooter game he’s been working on alongside Sacriel and Splash Damage to bring forth a new era of gaming. Splash Damage has over 20 years’ experience working on some of the biggest IPs in the world; Halo, Gears of War, Doom & more. Combined with my expertise in the FPS Industry - I believe we will create something truly special.

videos.name: Dev Diary
videos.title: Announcing Project Astrid – a new AAA open-world survival game from Splash Damage, Sacriel & shroud
